code: import axios from"axios";import{base_url}from"../../utils/baseUrl";import{config}from"../../utils/axiosconfig";const getColors=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"color"));return response.data;};const createColor=async color=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"color/"),color,config);return response.data;};const updateColor=async color=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(base_url,"color/").concat(color.id),{title:color.colorData.title},config);return response.data;};const getColor=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"color/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};const deleteColor=async id=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(base_url,"color/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};export const colorService={getColors,createColor,updateColor,getColor,deleteColor};
